org.sakaiproject.content.api

Interface GroupAwareEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentCollection, ContentCollectionEdit, ContentEntity, ContentResource, ContentResourceEdit, GroupAwareEdit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseContentService.BaseCollectionEdit, BaseContentService.BaseResourceEdit, BaseContentService.BasicGroupAwareEdit, ContentEntityWrapper

    public interface GroupAwareEntity
extends Entity

    GroupAwareEntity is an interface that must be implemented for entity types that are to be group aware.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GroupAwareEntity.AccessMode
      AccessMode enumerates different access modes for the entity: site-wide or grouped.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.entity.api.Entity

        SEPARATOR

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GroupAwareEntity.AccessMode getAccess()
      Access the access mode defined locally for the entity.
      Collection getGroupObjects()
      Access the groups, as Group objects, defined for this entity.
      Collection getGroups()
      Access the groups defined for this entity.
      GroupAwareEntity.AccessMode getInheritedAccess()
      Access the actual access mode used to compute who has access to the entity (usually SITE or GROUPED, but not INHERITED).
      Collection getInheritedGroupObjects()
      Access the groups, as Group objects, inherited by this entity.
      Collection getInheritedGroups()
      Access the groups inherited by this entity.
      Time getReleaseDate()
      Access the release date before which this entity should not be available to users except those with adequate permission (what defines "adequate permission" is TBD).
      Time getRetractDate()
      Access the retract date after which this entity should not be available to users except those with adequate permission (what defines "adequate permission" is TBD).
      boolean isAvailable()
      Calculate the avilability based on whether the item is hidden and (if not) whether it has a releaseDate or retractDate and (if so) neither of them restrict availabity right now.
      boolean isHidden()
      Access the raw availability setting for this entity: is it set to "hide" or "show".

      • Methods inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.entity.api.Entity

        getId, getProperties, getReference, getReference, getUrl, getUrl, toXml

    • Method Detail

      • getGroups

        Collection getGroups()
        Access the groups defined for this entity.
        Returns:
        A Collection of references to Group objects defined for this entity; empty if none are defined.

      • getGroupObjects

        Collection getGroupObjects()
        Access the groups, as Group objects, defined for this entity.
        Returns:
        A Collection (Group) of group objects defined for this entity; empty if none are defined.

      • getAccess

        GroupAwareEntity.AccessMode getAccess()
        Access the access mode defined locally for the entity.
        Returns:
        The access mode for the entity.

      • getInheritedGroups

        Collection getInheritedGroups()
        Access the groups inherited by this entity.
        Returns:
        A Collection of Group objects defined locally for this entity; empty if none are defined.

      • getInheritedGroupObjects

        Collection getInheritedGroupObjects()
        Access the groups, as Group objects, inherited by this entity.
        Returns:
        A Collection (Group) of group objects defined for this entity; empty if none are defined.

      • getInheritedAccess

        GroupAwareEntity.AccessMode getInheritedAccess()
        Access the actual access mode used to compute who has access to the entity (usually SITE or GROUPED, but not INHERITED). This may be defined locally or inherited from elsewhere for the entity. If the local access mode is INHERITED, the actual access mode must be retrieved from elsewhere.
        Returns:
        The actual access mode for the entity.

      • getReleaseDate

        Time getReleaseDate()
        Access the release date before which this entity should not be available to users except those with adequate permission (what defines "adequate permission" is TBD).
        Returns:
        The date/time at which the entity may be accessed by all users.

      • getRetractDate

        Time getRetractDate()
        Access the retract date after which this entity should not be available to users except those with adequate permission (what defines "adequate permission" is TBD).
        Returns:
        The date/time at which access to the entity should be restricted.

      • isHidden

        boolean isHidden()
        Access the raw availability setting for this entity: is it set to "hide" or "show". Does not take into account the release or retract dates.
        Returns:

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Calculate the avilability based on whether the item is hidden and (if not) whether it has a releaseDate or retractDate and (if so) neither of them restrict availabity right now.
        Returns:
        true if the entity is available now, false otherwise.
